entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 2.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 2.2°C
Wind: NE 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain or drizzle beginning this evening. Freezing rain inland overnight. Fog. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming east 20 near midnight then light overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle. Fog dissipating in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle changing to flurries in the evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023
